meanings.definition: A piece of dried mucus in the nose.
meanings.sent1: Tommy wiped a booger on his sleeve.
meanings.sent2: She discreetly removed the booger from her nostril.
meanings.sent3: The booger on the tissue looked like a tiny mountain.
meanings.sent4: The booger clung stubbornly to the edge of his nostril.
meanings.sent5: The child proudly displayed his booger collection.

meanings.definition: To pick one's nose to remove mucus.
meanings.sent2: He tried to discreetly booger while no one was looking.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly threatened to booger if he didn't stop teasing her.
meanings.sent4: The toddler's favorite pastime was to booger during playtime.
meanings.sent5: He always felt guilty after he would booger in private.
